page.title: 09Living in a village.
page.content: Living in a village is much more fun than living in a town .Towns are busy with cars and a smell of car fumes everywhere .Villages are very pretty and there is fresh air everywhere you go .It is peaceful in a village and there is not many cars. Schools in some villages are quite big but some schools are very small.Our village is the prettiest village in Essex. I like living in a village .I would never like to live in a town. Towns are more convenient for shopping. In the countryside you can go for walks and look at the lovely scenery .When I am not at school I go jogging round the playingfield with my next door neighbour .I hope I never move to a town.
